title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Recommendation Systems
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable recommendation algorithms, optimize model performance, conduct A/B testing, and collaborate with product teams to improve user engagement through personalized recommendations.
requirements_text: 5+ years of ML experience, strong background in recommendation systems, proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks.

title: NLP Research Scientist
responsibilities: Develop state-of-the-art NLP models, publish research papers, implement transformer-based architectures, and push the boundaries of language understanding.
requirements_text: PhD in CS/ML or equivalent experience, strong publication record, expertise in transformer models and NLP.

title: Search Engineer
responsibilities: Build and optimize search infrastructure, implement ranking algorithms, improve search relevance, and maintain large-scale search systems.
requirements_text: 3+ years experience with search technologies, strong understanding of information retrieval and ranking algorithms.

title: LLM Engineer
responsibilities: Fine-tune large language models, implement RAG systems, optimize prompt engineering workflows, and build LLM-powered applications.
requirements_text: Experience with LLMs, strong Python skills, familiarity with prompt engineering and vector databases.

title: Data Scientist - Personalization
responsibilities: Analyze user behavior data, build predictive models, design experiments, and develop personalization strategies to improve user experience.
requirements_text: Strong statistical background, experience with ML and data analysis, proficiency in Python and SQL.

title: Backend Engineer - Microservices
responsibilities: Design and develop microservices architecture, implement RESTful APIs, ensure system scalability and reliability, and optimize backend performance.
requirements_text: 4+ years backend development experience, strong knowledge of microservices patterns and cloud platforms.

title: Data Engineer
responsibilities: Build and maintain data pipelines, design data warehouse architecture, optimize ETL processes, and ensure data quality and availability.
requirements_text: Experience with big data technologies, strong SQL skills, knowledge of data modeling and warehouse design.

title: Full Stack ML Engineer
responsibilities: Develop end-to-end ML applications, build frontend interfaces for ML models, implement backend APIs, and deploy models to production.
requirements_text: Experience with both ML and web development, proficiency in Python and JavaScript frameworks.

title: NLP Engineer - Conversational AI
responsibilities: Build chatbots and conversational interfaces, implement intent recognition and entity extraction, fine-tune language models for dialogue systems.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and dialogue systems, knowledge of transformer models and prompt engineering.

title: Recommendation Systems Lead
responsibilities: Lead recommendation team, architect large-scale recommendation systems, mentor engineers, and drive innovation in personalization algorithms.
requirements_text: 7+ years experience in recommendation systems, proven leadership skills, deep expertise in ML and ranking algorithms.

title: Search Relevance Engineer
responsibilities: Improve search ranking quality, implement learning-to-rank models, analyze search metrics, and optimize relevance algorithms.
requirements_text: Strong background in information retrieval, experience with ranking algorithms and search systems.

title: Junior Data Scientist
responsibilities: Assist in data analysis projects, build basic ML models, create visualizations, and support senior data scientists in research tasks.
requirements_text: Bachelor's degree in quantitative field, knowledge of Python and basic ML concepts, eagerness to learn.

title: MLOps Engineer
responsibilities: Build ML infrastructure, implement CI/CD for models, monitor model performance, and automate ML workflows.
requirements_text: Experience with DevOps and ML systems, knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools.

title: Deep Learning Researcher - Vision
responsibilities: Research computer vision algorithms, develop novel architectures, publish papers, and implement cutting-edge vision models.
requirements_text: PhD or strong research background, expertise in computer vision and deep learning, publication record preferred.

title: Backend Engineer - Python
responsibilities: Develop RESTful APIs, optimize database queries, implement caching strategies, and maintain backend services.
requirements_text: 3+ years Python backend experience, strong knowledge of web frameworks and databases.

title: AI Product Engineer
responsibilities: Bridge AI research and product development, prototype AI features, gather user feedback, and iterate on AI-powered products.
requirements_text: Experience with ML/AI and product development, strong communication skills, ability to work cross-functionally.

title: Text Mining Specialist
responsibilities: Extract insights from unstructured text data, implement topic modeling and sentiment analysis, build text processing pipelines.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and text analytics, proficiency in Python and NLP libraries.

title: Graph ML Engineer
responsibilities: Develop graph neural networks, implement graph algorithms, build knowledge graph systems, and solve problems on graph-structured data.
requirements_text: Experience with graph algorithms and ML, knowledge of GNN architectures and graph databases.

title: Ranking Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Design and implement ranking algorithms for search and recommendation, optimize ranking models, conduct online experiments.
requirements_text: Strong background in ML and ranking systems, experience with large-scale systems.

title: LLM Fine-tuning Engineer
responsibilities: Fine-tune large language models for specific domains, implement RLHF and preference learning, optimize training pipelines, evaluate model performance.
requirements_text: Experience with LLM training and fine-tuning, strong understanding of transformer architectures and optimization.

title: Vector Search Engineer
responsibilities: Build vector search infrastructure, implement similarity search algorithms, optimize embedding models, integrate with LLM applications.
requirements_text: Experience with vector databases and similarity search, knowledge of embeddings and retrieval systems.

title: Distributed Systems Engineer - ML Infrastructure
responsibilities: Build distributed training systems, optimize model serving infrastructure, implement fault-tolerant ML pipelines, scale ML workloads.
requirements_text: Strong background in distributed systems, experience with ML infrastructure and large-scale systems.

title: Machine Translation Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and improve neural machine translation systems, implement multilingual models, optimize translation quality for various language pairs, evaluate MT systems.
requirements_text: Experience with NMT and sequence-to-sequence models, knowledge of transformer architectures and multilingual NLP.

title: Computer Vision Engineer - Medical Imaging
responsibilities: Develop AI models for medical image analysis, implement segmentation and detection algorithms, ensure regulatory compliance, collaborate with healthcare professionals.
requirements_text: Experience with computer vision and medical imaging, knowledge of CNN architectures and image processing.

title: Speech Recognition Engineer
responsibilities: Build automatic speech recognition systems, implement voice activity detection, optimize acoustic models, integrate with voice-based applications.
requirements_text: Experience with speech processing and ASR, knowledge of acoustic modeling and signal processing.

title: Reinforcement Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Develop RL algorithms for complex decision-making problems, implement policy optimization methods, design reward functions, evaluate agent performance.
requirements_text: Strong background in RL and optimization, experience with RL frameworks and game theory.

title: Anomaly Detection Specialist
responsibilities: Build models for detecting anomalies in time series and event data, implement unsupervised learning algorithms, monitor system health, investigate incidents.
requirements_text: Experience with anomaly detection and statistical methods, knowledge of time series analysis and ML.

title: Embeddings Engineer
responsibilities: Design and train embedding models for text, images, and multimodal data, optimize vector representations, evaluate embedding quality, integrate with search systems.
requirements_text: Experience with representation learning and embeddings, knowledge of contrastive learning and metric learning.

title: Federated Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Implement federated learning systems for privacy-preserving ML, design aggregation strategies, ensure data privacy, optimize communication efficiency.
requirements_text: Experience with distributed ML and privacy-preserving techniques, knowledge of federated learning frameworks.

title: Time Series Forecasting Specialist
responsibilities: Build forecasting models for business metrics, implement ARIMA, Prophet, and neural forecasting methods, evaluate prediction accuracy, provide actionable insights.
requirements_text: Strong background in time series analysis and forecasting, experience with statistical and ML methods.

title: AutoML Engineer
responsibilities: Develop automated machine learning pipelines, implement neural architecture search, optimize hyperparameter tuning, build AutoML platforms.
requirements_text: Experience with AutoML and meta-learning, knowledge of optimization algorithms and model selection.

title: Model Compression Engineer
responsibilities: Optimize ML models for edge deployment, implement quantization and pruning techniques, design efficient architectures, benchmark model performance.
requirements_text: Experience with model optimization and edge AI, knowledge of quantization, pruning, and distillation.

title: Explainable AI Engineer
responsibilities: Develop interpretable ML models, implement SHAP and LIME techniques, create visualization tools for model explanations, ensure AI transparency.
requirements_text: Experience with interpretability methods and ML, knowledge of explainability frameworks and visualization.

title: Prompt Engineer - LLM Applications
responsibilities: Design and optimize prompts for LLM applications, implement few-shot learning strategies, evaluate prompt effectiveness, build prompt libraries.
requirements_text: Experience with LLMs and prompt engineering, strong writing and analytical skills, knowledge of NLP.

title: Causal Inference Scientist
responsibilities: Design causal inference experiments, implement propensity scoring and matching methods, analyze treatment effects, advise on product decisions.
requirements_text: PhD or strong background in causal inference and statistics, experience with experimental design.

title: Sentiment Analysis Engineer
responsibilities: Build sentiment analysis models for social media and reviews, implement aspect-based sentiment analysis, track brand perception, provide insights.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and sentiment analysis, knowledge of transformer models and text classification.

title: Knowledge Graph Engineer
responsibilities: Build and maintain knowledge graphs, implement entity extraction and linking, design graph schemas, query optimization for graph databases.
requirements_text: Experience with knowledge graphs and graph databases, knowledge of NLP and semantic web technologies.

title: Active Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Implement active learning strategies for efficient data labeling, design query strategies, optimize human-in-the-loop systems, reduce annotation costs.
requirements_text: Experience with active learning and ML, knowledge of uncertainty estimation and query strategies.

title: Multimodal AI Engineer
responsibilities: Develop models combining text, image, and audio data, implement cross-modal retrieval, build multimodal embeddings, evaluate model performance.
requirements_text: Experience with multimodal learning and deep learning, knowledge of vision-language models.

title: Few-Shot Learning Researcher
responsibilities: Research and develop few-shot learning methods, implement meta-learning algorithms, evaluate on benchmark datasets, publish research findings.
requirements_text: PhD or strong research background in few-shot learning, expertise in meta-learning and transfer learning.

title: Data Scientist - AB Testing
responsibilities: Design and analyze AB tests, implement statistical testing frameworks, measure product impact, communicate results to stakeholders.
requirements_text: Strong statistical background, experience with experimentation and causal inference, proficiency in Python or R.

title: Conversational AI Research Scientist
responsibilities: Research dialogue systems and conversational AI, develop novel architectures for chatbots, implement context tracking, publish research papers.
requirements_text: PhD in NLP or related field, strong publication record, expertise in dialogue systems and LLMs.

title: ML Platform Engineer
responsibilities: Build and maintain ML platform infrastructure, implement feature stores, design model registry, optimize training and serving pipelines.
requirements_text: Experience with ML infrastructure and platform engineering, knowledge of Kubernetes and distributed systems.

title: Question Answering Engineer
responsibilities: Build QA systems using LLMs and retrieval methods, implement reading comprehension models, optimize answer extraction, evaluate QA performance.
requirements_text: Experience with NLP and QA systems, knowledge of transformers and information retrieval.

title: Generative AI Engineer
responsibilities: Develop generative models for text, images, and other modalities, implement GANs and diffusion models, optimize generation quality, deploy creative AI applications.
requirements_text: Experience with generative models and deep learning, knowledge of GANs, VAEs, and diffusion models.

title: Entity Resolution Engineer
responsibilities: Build entity resolution and deduplication systems, implement matching algorithms, design blocking strategies, ensure data quality.
requirements_text: Experience with entity resolution and data matching, knowledge of ML and graph algorithms.

title: Optimization Engineer - ML Systems
responsibilities: Optimize ML model training and inference, implement efficient algorithms, profile performance bottlenecks, reduce computational costs.
requirements_text: Experience with ML optimization and systems programming, knowledge of GPU programming and profiling tools.

title: Bias and Fairness Engineer
responsibilities: Detect and mitigate bias in ML models, implement fairness metrics, audit model decisions, ensure ethical AI practices.
requirements_text: Experience with ML fairness and bias mitigation, knowledge of fairness frameworks and ethics.

title: Synthetic Data Engineer
responsibilities: Generate synthetic data for ML training, implement privacy-preserving data generation, validate synthetic data quality, ensure regulatory compliance.
requirements_text: Experience with synthetic data generation and privacy techniques, knowledge of GANs and differential privacy.

title: Continual Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Develop continual learning systems that adapt to new data, implement incremental learning algorithms, prevent catastrophic forgetting, monitor model drift.
requirements_text: Experience with continual learning and online learning, knowledge of neural network plasticity and adaptation.
